transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ha bolo.
Customer: Hello. Ji namaskar sir Shahnawaz baat kar raha India Mart se.
Executive: Namaskar namaskar boliye.
Customer: Navnil Enterprises se baat kar rahe hai sir. Sir aap service use nahi kar rahe ho kafi time se.
Customer: Service use nahi kar rahe ho sir kafi time se.
Executive: Kiski service?
Customer: Sir India Mart ki.
Executive: Kiski service?
Customer: India Mart ki sir aapka service chal raha hai na sir India Mart ke sath.
Customer: Nahi.
Executive: Chal to raha hai sir tabhi hum aapko connect kar rahe hai sir.
Customer: India Mart me ho.
Executive: Navnil Enterprise se baat kar rahe hai.
Customer: Ha Navnil Enterprise se baat kar rahe hai.
Executive: Ji ji sir mai Shahnawaz baat kar raha sir aapka account manager India Mart se jisme aapki service chal rahi hai.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Isi ke liye maine aapko call kiya sir service aapki chal rahi hai but aap service use nahi kar rahe ho sir kafi time se.
Customer: Ha use to bhi kya ek do order aaye the lekin maine wo kam kam kiya hai.
Executive: Kam kam kiya sir aap hi dekhte ho catalog.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Catalog India Mart ka aap hi dekhte ho sir.
Customer: Nahi mera partner dekhta hai.
Executive: Call vagaira dusra number hai na.
Customer: Ji ji dusra number hai na.
Executive: Call vagaira sir ji ji thoda bahut aap information de hi sakte ho sir.
Customer: Ha bolo bolo.
Executive: Jaise aap all India me deal karte ho na sir.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: All India me deal karte ho sir for example aapke total nau product me aap deal kar rahe ho jisme groundnut oil hai groundnut oil cake hai.
Customer: Ha ha.
Executive: Groundnut cake hai mustard oil aur mustard oil mustard oil ha yellow mustard oil cake aise panch category me aap deal kar rahe ho aap mujhe ek bar confirm batao jo panch category me aap deal karte ho char category me jaise groundnut cake mustard oil cake aur groundnut tee oil cake aur groundnut oil.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Ye aapke char categories hai jisme aap deal karte ho sir aur all India me aap deal karte ho na sir.
Customer: All India me deal karte hai ya nahi karte hai.
Executive: Pan India me.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ji jaise aap for example ye wood press groundnut cake hai sir ye aapke liye relevant hai.
Customer: Groundnut to hai na mere pass.
Executive: Wood pressed groundnut cake hai sir.
Customer: Ha ha.
Executive: Ye kya cheez hota hai aur ek hota hai organic groundnut oil cake ye hai aapke pass.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Main aapke liye leke aa raha hu jaise kya hota hai ki aapko not relevant agar aapko lagta hai ki isme aap deal nahi karte to aap mujhe bataoge to mai use sahi karne ki koshish karunga sir.
Customer: Aap India Mart se bol rahe ho.
Executive: Ji ji ji sir mai aapka account manager ji sir aapka account manager baat kar raha hu sir India Mart se.
Customer: Ha to sir ek kam karo aap aadhe ghante ke baad call karo mai thoda kam me hu wo mungfali ka ek minute de do mai aapko ek minute de dijiye mai update kar deta hu yaha se aur aap mere ko thoda sa information de hi sakte ho sir jaise aap ek minute bas.
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Aap abhi catalog open nahi kar sakte sir na sir.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Sir Vadgam Gujarat ye aapka yaha se show ho raha hai sir yaha se aap proprietor ha thik hai Nilesh Chaudhari Navnil Enterprise ha Nilesh Chaudhari ka number hai na andar.
Customer: Ji ji mujhe hindi thodi kam aati hai.
Executive: Ji ha Gujarat me baat kar sakte hai matlab bahut maza aayega.
Customer: Ji ab ye calls vagaira aap hi dekhte ho na sir ek bar mai dobara call kar lunga iske liye aap mere ko thoda sa information guide kar doge to mai uske liye prepare hoke pahle se hi aapka catalog sahi rakhunga aur fir uske baad aap aadhe ghante baad hame connect kar lena sir jaise ye aapka hai cold pressed 5 liter Uma organic Uma aapka brand hai sir.
Executive: Ha Uma brand hai meri ha brand hai meri Uma.
Customer: Thik hai thik hai Uma oil brand ho gaya.
Executive: Hmm thik hai aur isme jo bhi aata hai 1 liter me aapke jyadatar product hai aur ek 5 liter ka teen hai 15 liter ka teen hai thik 15 kilo ka teen hai ye jo hai na sir 15 kilo ka ek teen hai jisme 197 per kg hai aur ek hai Uma oil mustard oil iska hai 225 per liter.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Thik hai aap minimum order kya bear karte ho sir 60 liter ka.
Customer: Kiska.
Executive: Ye jaise har ek product me jaise ek minimum order quantity hota hai na sir.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ke liye to wo kitne ka Nilesh Chaudhari ka number hai na Nilesh Chaudhari ka number hai na us pe aap ek bar bol dijiyega mai ek bar connect kar leta hu thik hai sir.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Okay sir okay thank you so much sir.
Customer: Hmm.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not using IndiaMART services.

- Wants to speak with Nilesh Chaudhari.

- Wants to update catalog.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed customer's business details.

- Executive offered to call back after 30 minutes.

- Executive offered to update the catalog.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back after 30 minutes.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- catalog, subscription, buyleads, follow up
